ModMetaData.name: Hauts' Intelligent Psycasters: Allies and Adversaries
ModMetaData.author: Hautarche
ModMetaData.description:
Adds non-player-controlled psycasters, and allows them to use psycasts intelligently. Supports psycasts from Royalty, Combat Psycasts, Cooler Psycasts, Extra Psycasts (Continued), [FSF] More Psycast Powers, Hauts' Offbeat Psycasts, Melee Psycasts (Continued), More Psycasts (Continued), and Sleepy's More Psycasts.
Psycasters can be found in raids, caravans, settlements, world sites, and even ancient dangers' cryptosleep caskets. Some factions have more psycasters than others, some have higher-level psycasters than others, and some field specific kinds of elite psycasters, such as the Empire's court psycasters or persona-wielding archotemplar.
You can hire mercenary psycasters on a temporary basis, through either trade caravans, settlements, or the comms console.
Use the mod settings to adjust what psycasts NPCs can use, how frequently they use them, and how common NPC casters are.
See the full description here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1VgFlFlvd3N4Xun0LHjdBwH-vXqQse1vLXDTUMdLLUug/edit?usp=sharing
